name: alphabetization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of arranging something in the same order as the letters of the alphabet : Alphabetization of a large number of records is very time-consuming if they aren't on a computer. an alphabetization system See
alphabetize
More examplesFewer examplesThe program allows alphabetization in reverse alphabetical order.Alphabetization of the research articles is by author, not by title. Different organizations may have different alphabetization rules.
